title: S rating after a ranked game and did not receive a token.
body: Hello I have Level 6 Sorcerer on Morgana and I recently received an S rank after a ranked game and I did not receive a mastery token. Is there any reason in particular that I did not receive a token after the game?

replies.body:
As *BridgeKeep* mentioned, for level 7 tokens, you have to earn an **S or S+ grade** in order to earn the token. An **S-** will **not count** for your level 7 token, as mentioned in our [Champion Mastery Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Did you get an S or an S-? to get lvl7 tokens you must get S or above. S- only gets you tokens to create lvl6 mastery.
this has been going on for a few days for me now
